Exitloop Keyword.description: Exits out of a While/Wend or For/Next loop.

Goto Keyword.description: Jump to another line in the current script.

For - To - Next Keywords.description: Use a FOR loop to execute a block of statements a specified number of times.

While - Wend Keywords.description: Use a WHILE loop to execute a block of statements as long as an expression is true.

If - Else If - Else - End If Keywords.description: Use the IF keyword to execute a block of statements only if a condition is true.

If - End If keywords.description: Use the IF keyword to execute a block of statements only if a condition is true.

Include Keyword.description: Use to reference another file in your script.

Sub New Keyword.description: A TBScript file consists of one or more subroutines. All scripts must define one subroutine called MAIN. Execution starts at this subroutine. Any subroutine can return a value using the RETURN keyword.

Sub Main Keyword.description: A TBScript file consists of one or more subroutines. All scripts must define one subroutine called MAIN. Execution starts at this subroutine. Any subroutine can return a value using the RETURN keyword.
